Name: 100 hidden cups
About the game: Art by Igor Shalimov Important information Press 'N' for night mode. Press 'Del' then 'Esc' to reset all achievements. 100 hidden cups is a hidden object game in the surreal setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics. Ultra hard! The strange cups are hidden on the paper. A difficult adventure for the eyes. Can you find 100 cups? Just click on the cup! Take care of your nerves!
